    • Method Detail

      • createScore

        public WrappedResponse<ScoreResponse> createScore(Long accountId,
                                         String appKey,
                                         Long missionId,
                                         Long gameId,
                                         Long packId,
                                         Long gameLevelId,
                                         Long gameObjectId,
                                         Integer points,
                                         Integer timeTaken)
                                           throws SirqulException
        Create a score. The response object will contain a series of coded messages detailing what items were completed, the score registered, and any tickets allocated. Scoring a level could complete the pack it is in, completing that pack could complete the game, which in turn could complete the mission. This completion chain is indicated to the client via a list of MessageResponse. The list of message codes are:
        • 3001 - total score of mission (sum of all game scores)
        • 3007 - mission has been completed
        • 4001 - total score of game (sum of all pack scores)
        • 4002 - game has been completed
        • 5001 - total score of pack (sum of all level scores)
        • 5002 - pack has been completed
        • 6001 - total score of level
        • 6002 - level has been completed
        • 6006 - tickets were allocated for score


        Target API Endpoint: /score/create
        Parameters:
        accountId - The logged in user.
        appKey - The game application key to save the score for.
        missionId - The missionId to score for, ignore if not playing mission.
        gameId - The gameId to score for, ignore if not playing mission.
        packId - The packId to score for, send -2 if playing community levels.
        gameLevelId - The gameLevelId to score for.
        gameObjectId - The gameObjectId to score for, ignore if level based scoring.
        points - The score
        timeTaken - The time taken to complete task
        Returns:
        error SirqulResponse, success a WrappedResponse < ScoreResponse>
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getScore

        public WrappedResponse<ScoreResponse> getScore(Long accountId,
                                      String appKey,
                                      Long missionId,
                                      Long gameId,
                                      Long packId,
                                      Long gameLevelId,
                                      Long gameObjectId)
                                        throws SirqulException
        Get the high score for an item. Pass in the full path IDs for the score.

        Target API Endpoint: /score/get
        Parameters:
        accountId - The logged in user.
        appKey - The game application key to get the level for.
        missionId - The missionId to score for, null if not playing mission.
        gameId - The gameId to score for, null if not playing mission.
        packId - The packId to score for, null if playing community levels.
        gameLevelId - The gameLevelId to score for.
        gameObjectId - The gameObjectId to score for, null if level based scoring.
        Returns:
        error SirqulResponse, success a WrappedResponse < ScoreResponse>
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • searchScores

        public WrappedResponse<List<ScoreResponse>> searchScores(Long accountId,
                                                String appKey,
                                                Long missionId,
                                                Long gameId,
                                                Long packId,
                                                Long gameLevelId,
                                                Long gameObjectId)
                                                  throws SirqulException
        Get the scores for an item. Pass in the full path IDs for the scores.

        Target API Endpoint: /score/search
        Parameters:
        accountId - The logged in user.
        appKey - The game application key to get the level for.
        missionId - The missionId to score for, null if not playing mission.
        gameId - The gameId to score for, null if not playing mission.
        packId - The packId to score for, null if playing community levels.
        gameLevelId - The gameLevelId to score for.
        gameObjectId - The gameObjectId to score for, null if level based scoring.
        Returns:
        error SirqulResponse, success a WrappedResponse <List< ScoreResponse>>
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.
